Actions.Name: Activate SharePoint Feature
Actions.Description: Activate a feature with specific ID

Actions.Name: Add Content Type to SharePoint List
Actions.Description: Adds the specified content type to a SharePoint list

Actions.Name: Add SharePoint Site Navigation Node
Actions.Description: Adds a menu item to either the quicklaunch or top navigation

Actions.Name: Add User to SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Adds a user to a specific SharePoint group

Actions.Name: Apply SharePoint Site Design
Actions.Description: Applies design to target SharePoint site

Actions.Name: Change SharePoint permissions
Actions.Description: Grant, remove and restore permissions for the site, the list, and the item

Actions.Name: Check In SharePoint Document
Actions.Description: Check-in the document at the specified URL with the specified comment

Actions.Name: Check Out SharePoint Document
Actions.Description: Check-out the document at the specified URL

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Item Attachments to URL
Actions.Description: Copies attachments from the SharePoint list item to the library using the specified folder URL

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Document from Library
Actions.Description: Copies the document from the document library to the specified URL. You can copy the document to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Document Set
Actions.Description: Copies the document set from the document library to the specified URL. You can copy the document sets to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Copy SharePoint Folder from Library
Actions.Description: Copies the folder from the document library to the specified URL. You can copy the folder to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Copy List Item to SharePoint List
Actions.Description: Copies the specified list item to another SharePoint list

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Document Set
Actions.Description: Creates a new document set in the document library by the specified URL

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Folder by URL
Actions.Description: Creates a new folder in the document library by the specified URL

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Folder in List
Actions.Description: Creates a new folder in the document library or list using the specified path

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint List or Library
Actions.Description: Create list or library by template

Actions.Name: Create Modern SharePoint Site
Actions.Description: Creates a modern SharePoint Team or Communication site

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Creates the SharePoint group with a specified name

Actions.Name: Create SharePoint Subsite from Template
Actions.Description: Create a new SharePoint site based on specific template

Actions.Name: Deactivate SharePoint Feature
Actions.Description: Deactivate a feature with specific ID

Actions.Name: Declare SharePoint Document as Record
Actions.Description: Declares Document in SharePoint Library As Record

Actions.Name: Delete SharePoint Site
Actions.Description: Deletes the SharePoint site by a specific URL

Actions.Name: Get SharePoint Items By CAML Query
Actions.Description: Executes a CAML query on a list or on a document library and returns the collection of elements

Actions.Name: Get Members of SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Gets members of a specific SharePoint group

Actions.Name: Get SharePoint Site Option Value
Actions.Description: Reads a value from SharePoint Site Options (Property Bag)

Actions.Name: Get SharePoint Item Versions History
Actions.Description: Returns the changes history for the specific field from the SharePoint list item

Actions.Name: Invite External User to SharePoint
Actions.Description: Invites external users with specific permission to an SharePoint site, an specific SharePoint group or an item in a SharePoint list

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Item Attachments to URL
Actions.Description: Moves attachments from the SharePoint list item to the library using the specified folder URL

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Document from Library
Actions.Description: Moves the document from the document library to the specified URL. You can copy the document to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Document Set
Actions.Description: Moves the document set from the document library to the specified URL. You can copy the document sets to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Move SharePoint Folder from Library
Actions.Description: Moves the folder from the document library to the specified URL. You can move the folder to another document library cross-site or to another folder

Actions.Name: Move List Item to SharePoint List
Actions.Description: Moves the specified list item to another SharePoint list

Actions.Name: Parse CSV
Actions.Description: It works like Parse JSON but for CSV file

Actions.Name: Provision PnP Template to SharePoint
Actions.Description: Applies a PnP template to a SharePoint site

Actions.Name: Provision PnP Tenant Template to SharePoint
Actions.Description: Applies a PnP tenant template to SharePoint

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Match
Actions.Description: Searches an input string for all occurrences of a regular expression and returns all the matches. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Replace
Actions.Description: In a specified input string, replaces all strings that match a regular expression pattern with a specified replacement string. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Regular Expression Test
Actions.Description: Indicates whether the regular expression specified in the Regex constructor finds a match in a specified input string. We would recommend you to use Regex Hero to test your expressions. It supports the same syntax as actions

Actions.Name: Remove SharePoint Document by URL
Actions.Description: Remove the document by a specific URL

Actions.Name: Remove SharePoint Folder by URL
Actions.Description: Removes the folder from the document library or list by the specified URL

Actions.Name: Remove SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Removes the SharePoint group by a specified name

Actions.Name: Remove SharePoint Site Navigation Node
Actions.Description: Removes a menu item from either the quicklaunch or top navigation

Actions.Name: Remove User from SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Removes a user from a specific SharePoint group

Actions.Name: Set Default SharePoint Site Group
Actions.Description: Configure default groups for a site with the help of Microsoft Flow. It is alternative of the /_layouts/15/permsetup.aspx page in SharePoint UI.

Actions.Name: Start SharePoint List Workflow (2013)
Actions.Description: Starts a SharePoint list level workflow and pass input parameters, if they were specified. The action can run only 2013 workflows

Actions.Name: Start SharePoint Site Workflow (2013)
Actions.Description: Starts a SharePoint site level workflow and pass input parameters, if they were specified. The action can run only 2013 workflows

Actions.Name: Undeclare SharePoint Document as Record
Actions.Description: Undeclares Document in SharePoint Library As Record

Actions.Name: Update SharePoint Item
Actions.Description: Updates an item in a SharePoint list or library

Actions.Name: Update SharePoint Group Properties
Actions.Description: Updates SharePoint group properties like AutoAcceptRequestToJoinLeave, AllowMembersEditMembership or other options described in MSDN

Actions.Name: Update SharePoint Site Properties
Actions.Description: Updates web properties like Title, Description or other string options described in at MSDN

Actions.Name: Is User Member of SharePoint Group
Actions.Description: Checks if a user is a member of a specifed SharePoint group
